thread.title: World Moto Announces HailYes™ Licensee Program
thread.title_full: World Moto Announces HailYes™ Licensee Program - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: World Moto Announces HailYes™ Licensee Program
text:
World Moto, Inc.
NEW YORK , Oct. 13, World Moto, Inc. (OTC: FARE) (BERLIN: WM7) ( BERLIN : A1J8SY) ("World Moto" or the "Company"), a leader in advanced solutions for motorcycle taxis and on-demand transport, today announced that it is launching a new program to provide interested parties with the opportunity to license HailYes™, the Company's smartphone application that instantly connects consumers to transport and commerce services in a local community.
"We believe the e-hailing market has reached an inflection point," said CEO Paul Giles . "The market has been developed by closed proprietary platforms to the point where our open, licensed solution can unlock the potential of legions of motivated entrepreneurs who are currently locked out of this opportunity."
Giles continued, "In the same way that licensing has become a dominant model in many technology sectors, such as smartphones and personal computers, we believe this open licensing program will create a similar impact in the e-hailing market and establish HailYes as a serious competitor to the closed, proprietary models entrenched in the industry today."
HailYes licensees not only get immediate access to an advanced e-hailing platform at a small fraction of what it would cost to develop a similar system, but also receive the benefits of tourists and businessmen that use HailYes ™ and roam into their territory. All the licensees need to do is to register drivers in their area, add users and start making money.
To take advantage of the opportunity to become a HailYes™ Licensee, please email hailyes@worldmoto.com
To be added to the World Moto email distribution list, please email FARE@kcsa.com with FARE in the subject line.
About World Moto
World Moto is a technology company that designs, manufactures, markets and sells Moto-Meter products, devices that provide moto-taxi fare metering and other communication capabilities. The Company's Moto-Meter patents have been granted in 4 countries, with applications pending in another 56 jurisdictions. World Moto's products and services include the Moto-Meter™, arguably the world's first motorcycle taxi meter, Wheelies™, which display static and streaming media content on the wheels of motorcycles and automobiles, and Yes™, an e-hailing and on-demand services app. on World Moto, please visit World Moto's website at www.worldmoto.com .

Such forward-looking statements include, among other things, release of HailYes™ apps , global ride-hailing market, growth of platform, target markets, product releases, product demand and, business strategy. Such factors include, among others, the inherent uncertainties associated with new projects and development stage companies.
